doc.name: colorDialogColors
doc.summary: Provides access to the custom colors the user sets in the color dialog.

examples.example: set the colorDialogColors to "100,50,0" & return & red

description.p: On Windows systems the user can define custom colors in the color dialog. The colorDialogColors provides a way to access the colors the user created in the dialog allowing a program to save them for the next session.
The colorDialogColors is a list of up to 16 colors. There may be empty lines in the list representing an unset color.
